subject: IllegalArgumentException
msgSnippet: Hello: I´m new in Junit. When I run the program never execute the sentence assertEquals( fail , e.getMessage());, never arrives here. thanks in advance I use
messageBody:
Hello:

I´m new in Junit.
When I run the program never execute the sentence
assertEquals("fail", e.getMessage());, never arrives here.
thanks in advance


I use the following code in Class1.java:

public void method1() throws IllegalArgumentException {

List<Long> list01 = new ArrayList<Long>();
list01 = null;

if (list01 == null) {
throws new IllegalArgumentException("fail");
}

}

in TestClass1.java

public void testMethod01() {

try {
Class1 class1 = new Class1();
class1.method1();
} catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
assertEquals("fail", e.getMessage());
}

}
